name: Live on
description:
A sudden shipwreck, in a crisis you grab a board and drift with the waves and fall into a coma.

There is a mysterious force that will take you to this deserted island. The only thing that can be exchanged with fate is your life.

You only have one goal - to live!

Clock is ticking,make the right choice!Build the woodcabin before is night!!!

This game have 3 different ends.Hope you enjoy.

CONTROL-

click

press number 1,2,3 to active the option
